channel.title: ZXScape [317] Brand new [ECO]
channel.description:
[center][b]Hello All![/b][/center]
[center][b]Welcome to our brand new ECO server ZXScape!
This server will make you work for your gear, train for your strength and barter for your wealth! The server has many many things to do. Ways to get rich. Ways to become, the Legend!
With being an ECO server items are obtained by playing a lot and swinging your sword! [/b][/center]
[center]ZXScape Includes:
Bank with banktabs 23 Fully working skills PKP Shop Vote for reward Vote point shop Prestigeing for points Prestige shop Glacors Jadinkos 600+ Items Strykewyrm Quest Lunar Diplomacy Quest Desert Treasure Quest Duel Arena Fight Pits Fight Caves Pest Control Barrows Save teleports with naming Slayer system Boss tasks Corporeal Beast Nex Charming Imp All chaotics working PvP Armours and weapons Achievement System Max cape miniquest Completionist cape with requirements Clanchat Dicing Mithril seeds (Planting flowers) Well thought out economy 2 Starters per IP Plenty of shops for the starter X2 XP WEEKENDS Auto Donation System Skilling Tasks Skilling Point Shop Skilling Area Donators only area Donators only slayer dungeon Vanguard PKing with PK points and Killstreaks Loyalty Points Ape Atoll with agressive monkey archers and monkey guards XP Modes (Disabled but can easily be enabled!) Membership system (Premium - 30 Days) Custom Area with clientsided objects (Very few lines) Tab to reply Zoom in and out (F11 - F12) Keys[/center]
[center][b]Client:[/b] https://www.dropbox.com/s/u1454msn2q9q780/ZXSCAPE.rar?dl=0 [b]Website/Forums:[/b] http://www.zxscape.enjin.com/home [/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/AGL2Ond.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AqTFedp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/obkoBFb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Sg4zyYq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2dV9TZC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UXAAN8a.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/paYe6Ne.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1uMaFM8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YnDKFp9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ya2cM2z.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wuYvRFU.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/RmDPoqT.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/11uer83.png[/img][/center]
[center]MORE PICTURES TO COME![/center]
[center]We [b]ARE [/b]currently looking for active staff members. Members that come to play and help other players. Therefore you must have a decent amount of time played![/center]
[center]________________________[/center]
[center]We hope to see you all soon![/center]

item.title: ZXScape [317] Brand new [ECO]
item.dc:creator: @JakehVIP JakehVIP
item.description:
@JakehVIP wrote:

[center]Hello All![/center]

[center][b]Welcome to our brand new ECO server ZXScape!

This server will make you work for your gear, train for your strength and barter for your wealth!
The server has many many things to do. Ways to get rich. Ways to become, the Legend!

With being an ECO server items are obtained by playing a lot and swinging your sword!
[/b][/center]

[center]ZXScape Includes:

Bank with banktabs
23 Fully working skills
PKP Shop
Vote for reward
Vote point shop
Prestigeing for points
Prestige shop
Glacors
Jadinkos
600+ Items
Strykewyrm Quest
Lunar Diplomacy Quest
Desert Treasure Quest
Duel Arena
Fight Pits
Fight Caves
Pest Control
Barrows
Save teleports with naming
Slayer system
Boss tasks
Corporeal Beast
Nex
Charming Imp
All chaotics working
PvP Armours and weapons
Achievement System
Max cape miniquest
Completionist cape with requirements
Clanchat
Dicing
Mithril seeds (Planting flowers)
Well thought out economy
2 Starters per IP
Plenty of shops for the starter
X2 XP WEEKENDS
Auto Donation System
Skilling Tasks
Skilling Point Shop
Skilling Area
Donators only area
Donators only slayer dungeon
Vanguard
PKing with PK points and Killstreaks
Loyalty Points
Ape Atoll with agressive monkey archers and monkey guards
XP Modes (Disabled but can easily be enabled!)
Membership system (Premium - 30 Days)
Custom Area with clientsided objects (Very few lines)
Tab to reply
Zoom in and out (F11 - F12) Keys[/center]

[center]Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/u1454msn2q9q780/ZXSCAPE.rar?dl=0
Website/Forums: http://www.zxscape.enjin.com/home
[/center]

[center]











[/center]

[center]MORE PICTURES TO COME![/center]

[center]We ARE currently looking for active staff members. Members that come to play and help other players. Therefore you must have a decent amount of time played![/center]

[center]________________________[/center]

[center]We hope to see you all soon![/center]
